description:
Meditation is powerful. It is profound. It can be as easy as a deep breath, or complex as a sequence of chants and movements. And while there is no such thing as a "one size fits all" meditation, there are a few key concepts and components that can make meditation accessible and effective for everybody.

Through the various experiences offered in this course, you will learn exactly what it means to meditate, and discover the particular style of meditation that works best for you.

The course is structured with short and simple lectures, and a variety of guided meditation experiences to help you begin your journey into less stress and greater focus.

Course Topics Include:

  • What is Meditation?
  • The 3 Keys: Posture, Place, and Space
  • Guided Meditation
  • Visualization
  • Mantra Meditation
  • Contemplation Meditation
  • Advanced Practices
  • And More!
title: Meditation 101: Your guide to Less Stress & Increased Focus!
